# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a toolbar title menu where actions are inferred from your apps commands.

## Declaration

```swift
init() where Content == EmptyView
```

## Creating a toolbar title menu

- **init(content:)**: Creates a toolbar title menu.
title: init()
